name: Monstrous Shrine
description: After sacrificing a Survivor, if there are no other Survivors in your space, gain 2 Blood Points.

name: Spies from the Shadow
description: When a crow is revealed, gain a Blood Point.

name: Thrill of the Hunt
description: When a Survivor leaves your space, move with them.

name: Bitter Murmur
description: After you move along a one-way path or breakable wall, move again along any path before interacting.

name: Deerstalker
description: When a wounded Survivor leaves your space, they roll the danger die. On a failure, they remain in place and cannot interact this turn.

name: Insidious
description: When you would attack a healthy Survivor, if you have not moved this turn, pick them up instead.

name: No One Escapes Death
description: At the end of your turn, if the exit gates are powered up, take a Killer bonus turn (1/round max).

name: Whispers
description: At the start of the planning phase, choose a Survivor. That Survivor either chooses to spend a Blood Point, or place their movement card face up.

name: Sloppy Butcher
description: When a Survivor attempts to heal, they roll the danger die instead.

name: Unrelenting
description: After interacting with a Survivor in your space, interact with a different Survivor in your space.

name: Distressing
description: After a Survivor moves into a space with a locker, they interact with that locker.

name: Iron Grasp
description: After a Survivor rolls the dice during a sacrifice attempt, they re-roll all skill check dice.

name: Overcharge
description: After you damage a generator, a Survivor in your or a connected space becomes wounded.

name: Overwhelming Presence
description: When a Survivor in your space or a connected space uses an item, they roll the danger die. On a failure, the item is discarded with no effect.

name: Devour Hope
description: At the start of cleanup, if a generator was completed this round, take a Killer bonus turn (1/round max).

name: Ruin
description: At the start of the planning phase, remove a progress from a generator, as long as there are no Survivors in that generator's space.

name: Enduring
description: When you would move along a path with a pallet, destroy the pallet and complete your turn as normal. You can still interact this turn.

name: Tinkerer
description: When a generator is completed, pick up and replace one of your set movement cards with a different card from your hand.

name: A Nurse's calling
description: After a Survivor becomes healthy, gain 2 Blood Points.

name: Thanatophobia
description: When a wounded survivor would perform a skill check, they roll the danger die instead.

name: Agitation
description: After you attack a healthy Survivor, move along any path.

name: Unnerving Presence
description: When a Survivor in your space or a connected space would perform a skill check, they roll the danger die instead.

name: Bloodhound
description: After you sacrifice a Survivor, they lose a Blood Point and you gain a Blood Point (even if they do not have any to lose).

name: Predator
description: At the end of the planning phase, choose a Survivor. They discard their set movement card, then replace it with a new one.

name: Dragon's Grip
description: When you damage a generator, discard up to 2 movement cards. Each Survivor in a space connected to that generator by either card's path either spends a Blood Point or becomes wounded.

name: Undying
description: At an interaction, discard a movement card except 'Wait' to interact with a prop in a space connected to that card's path.

name: Pop goes the Weasel
description: After wounding or sacrificing a Survivor, remove a crow, an unoccupied locker, or a chest in a connected space.

name: Bamboozle
description: At the start of the planning phase, place the Entity on a path. Players treat it as a breakable wall (you may pass through it freely).

name: Dead Man's Switch
description: After you sacrifice a Survivor, a generator or exit gate of your choice loses a progress.

name: Retribution
description: When a Survivor attempts to cleanse a Hex Totem, they roll the danger die instead. On a success, you gain 2 Blood Points.

name: Beast of Prey
description: At the start of the planning phase, move along any path.

name: Territorial Imperative
description: After interacting, use your Killer power (you can only use your Killer power once per round).

name: Discordance
description: When a Survivor enters the same space as another Survivor, gain a Blood Point for each Survivor and Killer in that space.

name: Iron Maiden
description: Before interacting, swap the positions of an unoccupied locker and an unoccupied hook anywhere on the game board.

name: Nemesis
description: After a Survivor interacts with a pallet or locker in your space or a connected space, remove the pallet or locker.

name: Zanshin Tactics
description: At the start of your turn, discard a set movement card and replace it with a new one.

name: Infectious Fright
description: After you attack a healthy Survivor, move a Survivor in a connected space along any path.

name: Corrupt Intervention
description: At the start of the planning phase, place the Entity on a revealed generator in any space. It cannot be interacted with.

name: Haunted Ground
description: After a Survivor reveals a prop, swap that prop with another revealed prop from the same category. Generators with progress, pallets on paths, occupied lockers, and occupied hooks can't be swapped.

name: Spirit Fury
description: After you break a pallet, gain 2 Blood Points.

name: Crowd Control
description: At the start of the planning phase, choose a survivor. The Survivors may collectively spend 2 Blood Points. Otherwise, you select what movement card the chosen Survivor will set from their hand for the turn.

name: Starstruck
description: When you would pick up a Survivor, move along any path and then pick up a different survivor instead (they do not need to be wounded).

name: Oppression
description: When you damage a generator, remove a progress from up to 2 other generators anywhere on the game board.

name: Hoarder
description: As an interaction, interact with a chest to remove it and gain 2 Blood Points.

name: Technician
description: When you roll a failure while interacting with a generator, interact again. The second interaction must target a different prop or Survivor.

name: Small Game
description: After you successfully cleanse a Hex Totem, the Killer loses 2 Blood Points.

name: Saboteur
description: After you sabotage a hook either gain a Blood Point, or spend 2 Blood points to take a Survivor bonus turn.

name: Calm Spirit
description: As an interaction, move a crow in your space to any space on the game board.

name: Leader
description: When another Survivor in your space moves, move with them, OR; when you move, another Survivor in your space moves with you.

name: Bond
description: When another Survivor in your space or a connected space would make a skill check, roll two skill check dice and keep either result instead.

name: Self-Care
description: At the start of your turn, roll the danger die. On a success, you become healthy.

name: Any Means Necessary
description: At the end of your turn, if you are healthy, become wounded to take a Survivor bonus turn.

name: We'll Make it
description: After you successfully heal another Survivor, that Survivor takes a Survivor bonus turn.

name: This is not happening
description: When performing a skill check, roll the danger die instead.

name: Quick and Quiet
description: When the Killer enters your space (before they interact), interact with a locker in your space.

name: Up the ante
description: At the end of your turn, take a Survivor bonus turn. The killer gains 2 Blood Points.

name: Ace in the hole
description: Before you interact, swap a prop in your space with another from the same category in a connected space. Generators with progress, occupied lockers, and occupied hooks can't be swapped.

name: Slippery Meat
description: At the start of the planning phase, if you are sacrificed, sabotage the hook you are on. You do not move or interact after this. (You can still set a card and take a normal turn after.)

name: Resilience
description: At the start of cleanup, if you were wounded this round, take a Survivor bonus turn.

name: Head On
description: After the Killer enters your space, remove a locker in your space to prevent the Killer from interacting this turn.

name: Solidarity
description: As an interaction, you may interact with another Surivvor in a connected space to use the 'heal' interaction on them.

name: Adrenaline
description: At the start of cleanup, if a generator was completed this round, take a Survivor bonus turn.

name: Boil Over
description: When you or another Survivor in your space is picked up, after the Killer decides how many dice to roll, the Survivor who was picked up may roll 4 skill check dice instead of the number the Killer chose.

name: Appraisal
description: When another Survivor would discard an item, you gain it instead. If you have more than one item, discard until you only have one.

name: No one Left Behind
description: As an interaction, interact with an exit gate (even if it's not powered up) to allow any Survivor to move along any path.

name: Deception
description: When you would move during your turn, remain in your space instead. You cannot interact this turn. Gain a Blood Point.

name: Built to Last
description: When you would discard an item after using it, keep it instead. You cannot use it again during this turn.

name: Spine Chill
description: When the Killer enters your space, roll the danger die. On a success, move along any path.

name: Distortion
description: After you move into the Killer's space during your turn, move again along any other path before interacting.

name: Dark Sense
description: When you enter a space with no props during your turn, move again along any other path before interact (if you would interact).

name: Alert
description: When the Killer breaks a pallet, moves through a breakable wall, or damages a generator, move along any path.

name: Aftercare
description: After you or another Survivor becomes healthy, sabotage an unoccupied hook anywhere on the game board.

name: Dance With Me
description: After you move, if you occupied a locker at the start of the turn, move again along any other path before interacting.

name: Autodidact
description: When you or another Survivor in your space or a connected space rolls a success, change the result to a great success instead.

name: Deliverance
description: After you sabotage an occupied hook or the hook you are on is sabotaged by another Survivor, either you or the other Survivor becomes healthy (your choice).

name: Dead Hard
description: When another Survivor in your space would be sacrificed, roll the danger die. On a success, that Survivor moves along any path instead of being sacrificed.

name: W're Gonna Live Forever
description: When the Killer would leave your space, prevent that move. The Killer can still interact in your space.

name: Empathy
description: At the start of your turn, you may take a Blood Point from a willing Survivor, OR; you may give a Blood Point to a willing Survivor.

name: Lucky Break
description: After any Survivor rolls a great success, you become healthy.

name: Self-Preservation
description: After the turn when another Survivor is wounded or sacrificed, interact with a locker in your space.

name: For the People
description: After you enter a space, if you are not wounded, become wounded to have another Survivor in your space become healthy or to add a progress to a generator (you can still interact this turn).

name: Off the Record
description: When you or another Survivor in your space or a connected space rolls a failure, you gain a Blood Point instead of the Killer.

name: Smash Hit
description: When the Killer breaks a pallet, moves thourhgh a breakable wall, or damages a generator, gain a Blood Point.

name: Street Wise
description: After you interact with a chest, the chest is not removed.

name: Urban Evasion
description: At the start of any Survivor turn, remove a breakable wall from play. Return it to play in the same path at the end of that Survivor turn.

name: Hope
description: When a generator is completed, gain a Blood Point.

name: Kindred
description: After you sabotage a hook or the hook you are on is sabotaged by another Survivor, both you and the Survivor (if there is one) gain a Blood Point.

name: Lightweight
description: At the end of the planning phase, discard a movement card and move along that card's path.

name: Plunderer's Instinct
description: When you would draw on item, draw three. Keep one and discard the other two.

name: Premonition
description: When the Killer enters your space, before they interact, interact with a crow in your space.

name: Visionary
description: When you would reveal a prop, reveal any prop in a connected space instead.

name: Deja-vu
description: When the Killer damages a generator in another space, interact with a generator in your space.
